com.almasb.fxgl.app

Class FXGL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.app.FXGL

  • public final class FXGL
extends Object
    Represents the entire FXGL infrastructure. Can be used to pass internal properties (key-value pair) around. Can be used for communication between non-related parts. Not to be abused.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
